summary:
Innovation-enthusiast PhD candidate MD with a solution-oriented, synthesizing and strategic mindset.
Currently working in top-tier, innovative medical device R&D and manufacturing as clinical scientist. 
Previous experience in product and market strategy development in the clinical trial equipment supply market, original pharma development strategy, scientific project management in pharma and medical device development, primary- and acute patient care, vascular medicine, radiology and cardiology.

projects.title: Clinical validation and implementation of Digital Variance Angiography

projects.title: EHDEN Innovative Medicines Initiative
projects.description:
Healthcare service data harmonization within the patient-centered Observational Medical Outcomes Partnership (OMOP) CDM workframe:

Healthcare data has the potential to transform the understanding of health, disease and outcomes, yet it is currently scattered across multiple institutions and countries, stored in different formats, and subject to different rules. This makes it very difficult to fully utilise this data to benefit patients.  The goal of EHDEN is to make the large-scale analysis of health data in Europe a reality. The project aims to do this by building a federated data network of allowing access to the data of 100 million EU citizens standardised to a common data model.

publications.name: Digital variance angiography allows about 70% decrease of DSA-related radiation exposure in lower limb X-ray angiography

profile_positions.description:
Image-Guided Therapy Systems (IGT-S) Clinical Science Unit

Translating the clinicians’ needs to idea/innovation-to-market (I2M), evidence-based, multidisciplinary advanced development projects.
Creating and maintaining unique and sustainable value proposition and lifecycle for IGT systems, hybrid ORs, and the provided solutions thereof by facilitating efficient and rigorously quality-based evidence synthesis.
profile_positions.title: Clinical Scientist Neurosurgery/Neurovascular

profile_positions.description:
Providing high-value and complex medical equipment solutions for international clinical trials. 

Establishing KOL, external collaborator and vendor network based on corporate mission and scientific value proposition priorities, such as advocating the importance of data integrity and equipment standardization or facilitating the implementation of novel, precision eligibility or outcome assessment techniques in clinical trials.

Advising on evaluation of custom medical device procurement and middle- to long-term, strategic planning of portfolio products and services and market strategy based on the most up-to-date scientific data and efficient market intelligence sources.

Providing advice to clients and internal departments for precise device selection for eligibility and endpoint assessment based on medical research expertise.

Supporting the workflow with both first-hand patient care and sponsor-level clinical trial planning and execution experience. Collaborating in the conceptualization of an internal procurement-, product- and market strategy management RACI matrix, a product evolution pathway concept, and a category core-team based system for internal project- and knowledge management.

Creating internal training/onboarding processes and content.
profile_positions.title: Product Strategy Manager

profile_positions.description: Hungarian New National Excellence Programme (ÚNKP) research fund supported clinical research activity at the Department of Vascular Surgery and Endovascular Therapy in previous PhD-associated projects by supporting innovations in vascular imaging and endovascular therapeutic methods with special regard to radiation and contrast dose reduction, intervention planning, patient and staff safety.
profile_positions.title: Research Fellow

profile_positions.description: Supporting research in the MRI imaging of the pancreas and the biliary system at the Clinical Radiology Department and the C.J. Gorter Center for High Field MRI.
profile_positions.title: Visiting Researcher

profile_positions.description: Research- and medical directorial decision support, establishment and maintenance of external expert collaborator relations and strategic planning of early- and late phase neuropsychiatric original drug development projects based on medical practice and scientific data, systematic literature and competitive intelligence review. Providing medical scientific expertise and insight from research/discovery to late clinical development phase.
profile_positions.title: Senior Global Medical Advisor / Medical Science Strategist

profile_positions.description: Pharmaceutical development-associated clinical research activity in industry-sponsored studies investigating CNS-targeted small molecules
profile_positions.title: Clinical Research Scientist

profile_positions.description:
Resident radiologist at the Department of Invasive Cardiology with special interest in endovascular procedures.
Clinical research activity in cardiovascular pharmaceutical and medical device-related studies.
profile_positions.title: Physician

profile_positions.description:
Clinical development and validation of a software that incorporates a patented, innovative X-ray image processing algorithm in the MEDDEV/MDR and ISO 13485/14155 framework. Scientific publication in top-tier journals (Radiology, Investigative Radiology) and regular presentation at global (US/EU) conferences (RSNA, CIRSE, ESVS, Charing Cross, LINC). Maintaining good working relations with local and international collaborative partners and KOLs.
Management and conduct of medical device-related clinical validation trials and regulatory affairs. Medical writing tasks for the submission of clinical trials to ethics committees and competent authorities.
profile_positions.title: Clinical Research and Development Specialist

profile_positions.description: Resident cardiologist with special interest in invasive procedures, cardiac critical care, post-transplantation and heart failure therapy
profile_positions.title: Physician

volunteer_experiences.description:
Guest experience and attendance research at the 2022 edition of the International Film Festival Rotterdam (IFFR). The event offers a high quality line-up of carefully selected fiction and documentary feature films, short films and media art as well as retrospectives and themed programmes.

After all the preparations, the event was cancelled due to the pandemic-related safety regulations.
Online and on the spot audience assistance, inquiries regarding tickets, personal IFFR accounts or other specific questions.
